channel.title: Comments on: Where in the WoW?

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Yep, Coilfang Reservoir Entrance, and yep, we too have have seen this many times flyin' in (or ghosting back).
item.content:encoded: Yep, Coilfang Reservoir Entrance, and yep, we too have have seen this many times flyin’ in (or ghosting back).

item.title: By: Anonymous Coward
item.dc:creator: Anonymous Coward
item.description: Coilfang Reservoir Entrance. Man i've seen that sight too many days over the last week, Lady Vashj learning ftl.
item.content:encoded: Coilfang Reservoir Entrance. Man i’ve seen that sight too many days over the last week, Lady Vashj learning ftl.

item.title: By: Acid
item.dc:creator: Acid
item.description: It's almost too easy that i'm looking for some reason why it wouldn't be coilfang entrance lol.
item.content:encoded: It’s almost too easy that i’m looking for some reason why it wouldn’t be coilfang entrance lol.

item.title: By: Indy
item.dc:creator: Indy
item.description:
Water no longer automatically dismounts you as of a recent patch (flying mounts, anyway). This is a *good* thing....
Have you tried skimming the water's surface on an aether ray? It's pretty cool...
item.content:encoded:
Water no longer automatically dismounts you as of a recent patch (flying mounts, anyway). This is a *good* thing….

Have you tried skimming the water’s surface on an aether ray? It’s pretty cool…

item.title: By: celerie
item.dc:creator: celerie
item.description:
yep, coilfang entrance. i make a beeline for it and stop paying attention to where i'm going until i get there.
have you noticed recently that you can't just fly down the spiral and into the water anymore? gryphons are now apparently unable to get wet.
item.content:encoded:
yep, coilfang entrance. i make a beeline for it and stop paying attention to where i’m going until i get there.

have you noticed recently that you can’t just fly down the spiral and into the water anymore? gryphons are now apparently unable to get wet.

item.title: By: Gheist
item.dc:creator: Gheist
item.description: The graveyard that is pvp controlled in Zangra, looking onto the water entrance of Coilfang.
item.content:encoded: The graveyard that is pvp controlled in Zangra, looking onto the water entrance of Coilfang.

item.title: By: Papa
item.dc:creator: Papa
item.description: Twin Spires in Zanga or possibly the Melbourne Arts Centre spire in Southbank.
item.content:encoded: Twin Spires in Zanga or possibly the Melbourne Arts Centre spire in Southbank.

item.title: By: Gogey
item.dc:creator: Gogey
item.description: The exterior of Coilfang Reservoir in Zangarmarsh.
item.content:encoded: The exterior of Coilfang Reservoir in Zangarmarsh.

item.title: By: Ramada
item.dc:creator: Ramada
item.description: Zangarmarsh. Dunno the exact location but I fly over it all the time on my mount.
item.content:encoded: Zangarmarsh. Dunno the exact location but I fly over it all the time on my mount.
